content.review_content: My Mom and I stayed at Rosemia 28-30 July 19 and we are more than happy and satisfied with what we have experienced here. Excellent airport pick-up service with a great car. Friendly, easy-to-approach, professional staff with really good manners. New and clean room. Great TV and wifi reception. What surprised us the most is Mr Ngo Duc Cuong, one of the restaurant staff. He serves, pays attention to and remember us very well. He could even remember what we drink on our first breakfast and make us the same the next day although we don't even remember. We're also surprised when they even help me with my wet iphone by giving me heaps of rice to soak it in. Awesome!!!! Generally, 5 stars for the hotel and 5 star plus for its staff. Will come back next time â¤ï¸ --------- Máº¹ em vÃ  em Ä‘Ã£
